name: TWF.app
short_description:
TWF.app plans to be a boutique app for users on the TWF forum.
It will augment the experience of attending Western Force games by leveraging content from the forum in a useful format for viewing whilst at games.

It might include links to post to forum, location services, content distribution, basically anything that TWF can provide beyond the basic web function which is already available.

Currently there are no plans to extend it's reach beyond the TWF community.
summary: TWF plans to be a boutique mobile app for users on the TWF forum
